about_the_game:
Midnight Stories

NEW 19-JUN-2021: THE STORY HAS NOW 5 EPISODES!!! and more voices will be available soon
Three episodes that Include: voice audio (only in episode 1), animations, 4K renders and a lot of options that lead to different paths.

STORY

This game has five episodes and consists of images and text / choices. Explore each unique episode with its own characteristics.
In episode one you can choose between more voices to enjoy a sensual narration.
The second episode has more choices and it has three people as main cast. One man and two women are eager to let you discover all the possible paths.
The third episode is the longest and most complex and has more than 90 choices.

FEATURES


  • 3840 x 2160 pixel (4K UHDTV) resolution
  • original renders created with 3D photorealistic software
  • voice acting (when available) by professionals
  • high quality soundtrack
  • a huge number of choices and path options (around 100 individual menus)
  • replay friendly as different choices lead to different endings
  • image gallery included in the img subfolder of the game

Disclaimer
The characters in this game are all over 18 years old. They are adults (grown-up). The content of this game is purely fictitious and has no intention of showing or describing any real event, character or entity. If identical, it is purely coincidental.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Midnight Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft XP
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: This game has three erotic episodes and features multiple voice selection, a multitude of options and game path, animations and 4K renders.
